channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ND

item.title: Report E-2024070179
item.description:
Report E-2024070179

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-11T18:15:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-08
  • City: FARGO
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one (1) gallon of material released from four (4) 1/2-gallon metal cans. The released material impacted the concrete terminal floor. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and containerized the damaged cans and clean-up debris into one (1) 10-gallon metal drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
